system.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted by a Physical- or Special-Category Attack.

Effect: The user can spend 2 extra PP to declare this attack at [Interrupt 2]. The user then may freely move up to half of the Movement Score of their choice towards the target and then attack with this attack. If the target gains @Affliction[fainted] due to damage from this move, the triggering attack fails.
